description.value:
Your venom grows deadlier and more plentiful. You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Envenom] to lesser vishkanyan venom. Envenom's frequency becomes once per hour.

Lesser Vishkanyan Venom (level 1)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:poison]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage (1 round)
